```{=html}
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bricolage+Grotesque:opsz,wght@12..96,400;12..96,700;12..96,800&family=IBM+P
  lex+Mono:wght@400;500;600&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<style>
  *,
  *::before,
  *::after {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  :root {
    --bg: #ffffff;
    --bg-raised: #faf9f7;
    --bg-card: #f4f3f0;
    --text: #1a1a1a;
    --text-dim: #5c5c5c;
    --text-muted: #999;
    --border: #e8e6e1;
    --border-light: #f0eee9;
    --blue: #2563eb;
    --blue-light: #eff4ff;
    --amber: #c2860e;
    --amber-light: #fef9ee;
    --coral: #c0452a;
    --coral-light: #fef2ee;
    --green: #0d7c56;
    --green-light: #edfcf5;
    --font-display: 'Bricolage Grotesque', sans-serif;
    --font-mono: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace;
  }

  html {
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
  }

  body {
    font-family: var(--font-mono);
    font-size: 15px;
    line-height: 1.7;
    color: var(--text);
    background: var(--bg);
    overflow-x: hidden;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  }

  /* ── Hero ── */
  .hero-wrapper {
    width: 100vw;
    margin-left: calc(-50vw + 50%);
    background: var(--bg-raised);
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .hero {
    min-height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
    padding: 6rem 2.5rem 4rem;
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }

  .hero-bg {
    position: absolute;
    inset: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .hero-gradient {
    position: absolute;
    width: 800px;
    height: 800px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    filter: blur(120px);
    opacity: 0.08;
  }

  .hero-gradient--blue {
    top: -200px;
    right: -100px;
    background: var(--blue);
  }

  .hero-gradient--amber {
    bottom: -300px;
    left: -200px;
    background: var(--amber);
  }

  .hero-content {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    width: 100%;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: 4rem;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .hero-text h1 {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 800;
    font-size: clamp(3rem, 5.5vw, 5rem);
    line-height: 1.05;
    letter-spacing: -0.03em;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
    color: var(--text);
  }

  .hero-text h1 .accent-blue {
    color: var(--blue);
  }

  .hero-text h1 .accent-amber {
    color: var(--amber);
  }

  .hero-text p {
    color: var(--text-dim);
    font-size: 0.95rem;
    max-width: 460px;
    margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
  }

  .hero-actions {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .btn-primary {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    background: var(--text);
    color: var(--bg);
    padding: 0.85rem 2rem;
    border-radius: 8px;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-family: var(--font-mono);
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    letter-spacing: 0.02em;
    transition: opacity 0.2s, transform 0.2s;
  }

  .btn-primary:hover {
    opacity: 0.85;
    transform: translateY(-1px);
  }

  .btn-secondary {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    color: var(--text-dim);
    padding: 0.85rem 1.5rem;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-family: var(--font-mono);
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    letter-spacing: 0.02em;
    border: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius: 8px;
    transition: color 0.2s, border-color 0.2s;
  }

  .btn-secondary:hover {
    color: var(--text);
    border-color: var(--text-dim);
  }

  /* ── Animated blocks canvas ── */
  .hero-visual {
    position: relative;
    height: 450px;
  }

  .block-node {
    position: absolute;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    color: var(--bg);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
    animation: float 6s ease-in-out infinite;
    cursor: default;
    transition: transform 0.3s;
  }

  .block-node:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }

  .block-node .block-label {
    font-size: 0.65rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.1em;
    opacity: 0.8;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }

  .block-node .block-title {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  .block--data {
    top: 30px;
    left: 10%;
    background: var(--blue);
    animation-delay: 0s;
  }

  .block--filter {
    top: 140px;
    left: 40%;
    background: var(--amber);
    animation-delay: -1.5s;
  }

  .block--plot {
    top: 260px;
    left: 15%;
    background: var(--coral);
    animation-delay: -3s;
  }

  .block--export {
    top: 320px;
    left: 55%;
    background: var(--green);
    color: var(--bg);
    animation-delay: -4.5s;
  }

  @keyframes float {

    0%,
    100% {
      transform: translateY(0);
    }

    50% {
      transform: translateY(-12px);
    }
  }

  /* Connector lines */
  .connector-svg {
    position: absolute;
    inset: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    z-index: -1;
  }

  .connector-line {
    stroke: var(--border);
    stroke-width: 2;
    stroke-dasharray: 6 4;
    fill: none;
    animation: dash 20s linear infinite;
  }

  @keyframes dash {
    to {
      stroke-dashoffset: -200;
    }
  }

  /* ── Section shared ── */
  section {
    padding: 7rem 2.5rem;
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }

  .section-label {
    font-size: 0.7rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.15em;
    color: var(--blue);
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .section-title {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 800;
    font-size: clamp(2rem, 3.5vw, 3rem);
    letter-spacing: -0.03em;
    line-height: 1.1;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
    color: var(--text);
  }

  .section-subtitle {
    color: var(--text-dim);
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    max-width: 560px;
    margin-bottom: 3.5rem;
  }

  /* ── Problem section ── */
  .problem {
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  }

  .problem-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .problem-card {
    background: var(--bg-raised);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
    border-radius: 12px;
    padding: 2rem;
    transition: border-color 0.3s, transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
  }

  .problem-card:hover {
    border-color: var(--border);
    transform: translateY(-4px);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
  }

  .problem-card .icon {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
  }

  .problem-card:nth-child(1) .icon {
    background: var(--blue-light);
    color: var(--blue);
  }

  .problem-card:nth-child(2) .icon {
    background: var(--amber-light);
    color: var(--amber);
  }

  .problem-card:nth-child(3) .icon {
    background: var(--coral-light);
    color: var(--coral);
  }

  .problem-card h3 {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.15rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
    color: var(--text);
  }

  .problem-card p {
    color: var(--text-dim);
    font-size: 0.82rem;
    line-height: 1.7;
  }

  /* ── How it works ── */
  .how-it-works {
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  }

  .steps {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
    gap: 1.5rem;
    counter-reset: step;
  }

  .step {
    counter-increment: step;
    position: relative;
    padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
    background: var(--bg-raised);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
    border-radius: 12px;
    transition: border-color 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
  }

  .step:hover {
    border-color: var(--border);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
  }

  .step::before {
    content: counter(step, decimal-leading-zero);
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 800;
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    color: var(--border);
    position: absolute;
    top: 0.75rem;
    right: 1rem;
  }

  .step-color {
    width: 6px;
    height: 32px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
  }

  .step:nth-child(1) .step-color {
    background: var(--blue);
  }

  .step:nth-child(2) .step-color {
    background: var(--amber);
  }

  .step:nth-child(3) .step-color {
    background: var(--coral);
  }

  .step:nth-child(4) .step-color {
    background: var(--green);
  }

  .step h3 {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.05rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.6rem;
    color: var(--text);
  }

  .step p {
    color: var(--text-dim);
    font-size: 0.8rem;
  }

  /* ── Features ── */
  .features {
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  }

  .features-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: 1.5rem;
  }

  .feature-card {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1.25rem;
    padding: 1.75rem;
    background: var(--bg-raised);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
    border-radius: 12px;
    transition: border-color 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
  }

  .feature-card:hover {
    border-color: var(--border);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
  }

  .feature-icon {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: 44px;
    height: 44px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    background: var(--blue-light);
    color: var(--blue);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
  }

  .feature-card h3 {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
    color: var(--text);
  }

  .feature-card p {
    color: var(--text-dim);
    font-size: 0.8rem;
  }

  /* ── Code export ── */
  .code-section {
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border-light);
  }

  .code-layout {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: 3rem;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .code-block {
    background: #1e1e2e;
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  }

  .code-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.85rem 1.25rem;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
  }

  .code-dot {
    width: 10px;
    height: 10px;
    border-radius: 50%;
  }

  .code-dot:nth-child(1) {
    background: #f87171;
  }

  .code-dot:nth-child(2) {
    background: #fbbf24;
  }

  .code-dot:nth-child(3) {
    background: #34d399;
  }

  .code-header span {
    margin-left: 0.5rem;
    font-size: 0.72rem;
    color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
  }

  .code-body {
    padding: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    line-height: 1.9;
    overflow-x: auto;
    color: #cdd6f4;
  }

  .code-body .kw {
    color: #89b4fa;
  }

  .code-body .fn {
    color: #f9e2af;
  }

  .code-body .str {
    color: #a6e3a1;
  }

  .code-body .comment {
    color: #6c7086;
    font-style: italic;
  }

  .code-body .op {
    color: #f38ba8;
  }

  .code-text h3 {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 800;
    font-size: 1.6rem;
    letter-spacing: -0.02em;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    color: var(--text);
  }

  .code-text p {
    color: var(--text-dim);
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
    max-width: 400px;
  }

  /* ── Ecosystem ── */
  .ecosystem {
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border-light);
    text-align: center;
  }

  .eco-pills {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 0.6rem;
    max-width: 800px;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }

  .eco-pill {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0.5rem 1.1rem;
    background: var(--bg);
    border: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius: 100px;
    font-size: 0.78rem;
    color: var(--text-dim);
    transition: color 0.2s, border-color 0.2s, transform 0.2s;
    cursor: default;
  }

  .eco-pill:hover {
    color: var(--text);
    border-color: var(--text-muted);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
  }

  .eco-pill .dot {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 6px;
    height: 6px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
    vertical-align: middle;
  }

  /* ── CTA ── */
  .cta {
    text-align: center;
    padding: 8rem 2.5rem;
    position: relative;
    background: var(--bg-raised);
  }

  .cta-glow {
    position: absolute;
    width: 600px;
    height: 600px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: var(--blue);
    filter: blur(160px);
    opacity: 0.04;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  }

  .cta-content {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .cta h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 800;
    font-size: clamp(2rem, 4vw, 3.5rem);
    letter-spacing: -0.03em;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    color: var(--text);
  }

  .cta p {
    color: var(--text-dim);
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
  }

  .cta .install-cmd {
    display: inline-block;
    background: #1e1e2e;
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
    padding: 1rem 2rem;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    margin-top: 1.5rem;
    color: #cdd6f4;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: transform 0.2s;
  }

  .cta .install-cmd:hover {
    transform: translateY(-1px);
  }

  .cta .install-cmd .kw {
    color: #89b4fa;
  }

  .cta .install-cmd .fn {
    color: #f9e2af;
  }

  .cta .install-cmd .str {
    color: #a6e3a1;
  }

  /* ── Scroll reveal ── */
  .reveal {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
    transition: opacity 0.8s ease, transform 0.8s ease;
  }

  .reveal.visible {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }

  .reveal-delay-1 {
    transition-delay: 0.1s;
  }

  .reveal-delay-2 {
    transition-delay: 0.2s;
  }

  .reveal-delay-3 {
    transition-delay: 0.3s;
  }

  .reveal-delay-4 {
    transition-delay: 0.4s;
  }

  /* ── Responsive ── */
  @media (max-width: 900px) {
    .hero-content {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .hero-visual {
      display: none;
    }

    .problem-grid {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .steps {
      grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    }

    .features-grid {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .code-layout {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .steps {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    section {
      padding: 4rem 1.25rem;
    }
  }
</style>

<!-- Hero -->
<div class="hero-wrapper">
  <div class="hero-bg">
    <div class="hero-gradient hero-gradient--blue"></div>
    <div class="hero-gradient hero-gradient--amber"></div>
  </div>
  <section class="hero">
    <div class="hero-content">
      <div class="hero-text">
        <h1>
          <span class="accent-blue">Dashboards</span><br>
          in <span class="accent-amber">Minutes</span>
        </h1>
        <p>
          A visual, block-based framework for R. Build data workflows,
          connect transformations, and ship interactive dashboards &mdash;
          no code required.
        </p>
        <div class="hero-actions">
          <a href="#get-started" class="btn-primary">
            Install blockr &rarr;
          </a>
          <a href="#how-it-works" class="btn-secondary">
            See how it works
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="hero-visual">
        <svg class="connector-svg" viewBox="0 0 500 450">
          <path class="connector-line" d="M 90 65 Q 200 100 230 170" />
          <path class="connector-line" d="M 230 200 Q 150 240 120 290" />
          <path class="connector-line" d="M 250 200 Q 300 260 310 345" />
        </svg>
        <div class="block-node block--data">
          <div class="block-label">Data</div>
          <div class="block-title">iris dataset</div>
        </div>
        <div class="block-node block--filter">
          <div class="block-label">Transform</div>
          <div class="block-title">filter &amp; select</div>
        </div>
        <div class="block-node block--plot">
          <div class="block-label">Visualize</div>
          <div class="block-title">scatter plot</div>
        </div>
        <div class="block-node block--export">
          <div class="block-label">Export</div>
          <div class="block-title">download CSV</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>
</div>

<!-- Problem -->
<section class="problem" id="problem">
  <div class="section-label reveal">The problem</div>
  <h2 class="section-title reveal">Three audiences, one framework</h2>
  <p class="section-subtitle reveal">
    Non-coders can't build dashboards. Coders can, but it takes too long.
    Organizations need both speed and customization.
  </p>
  <div class="problem-grid">
    <div class="problem-card reveal reveal-delay-1">
      <div class="icon">&lt;/&gt;</div>
      <h3>Non-coders are locked out</h3>
      <p>
        Analysts and researchers have data but no way to explore it
        interactively without learning R or Python first.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="problem-card reveal reveal-delay-2">
      <div class="icon">&circlearrowright;</div>
      <h3>Coders move too slowly</h3>
      <p>
        Building a Shiny dashboard from scratch takes days of boilerplate,
        layouts, and reactive plumbing.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="problem-card reveal reveal-delay-3">
      <div class="icon">&Delta;</div>
      <h3>Tools don't extend</h3>
      <p>
        Off-the-shelf BI tools are rigid. When you hit their limits,
        you start over. blockr lets you build custom blocks in R.
      </p>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

<!-- How it works -->
<section class="how-it-works" id="how-it-works">
  <div class="section-label reveal">How it works</div>
  <h2 class="section-title reveal">Snap blocks together</h2>
  <p class="section-subtitle reveal">
    Each block does one thing well. Chain them into complete analysis
    pipelines with instant visual feedback.
  </p>
  <div class="steps">
    <div class="step reveal reveal-delay-1">
      <div class="step-color"></div>
      <h3>Load data</h3>
      <p>Import CSV, Excel, Parquet, or connect to any R data source.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="step reveal reveal-delay-2">
      <div class="step-color"></div>
      <h3>Transform</h3>
      <p>Filter, select, mutate, summarize, join &mdash; powered by dplyr.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="step reveal reveal-delay-3">
      <div class="step-color"></div>
      <h3>Visualize</h3>
      <p>Scatter, bar, line, histogram &mdash; ggplot2 under the hood.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="step reveal reveal-delay-4">
      <div class="step-color"></div>
      <h3>Export</h3>
      <p>Download results or export reproducible R code for your pipeline.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

<!-- Features -->
<section class="features" id="features">
  <div class="section-label reveal">Features</div>
  <h2 class="section-title reveal">Built for real work</h2>
  <p class="section-subtitle reveal">
    Not a toy. A framework that scales from quick exploration to
    production dashboards.
  </p>
  <div class="features-grid">
    <div class="feature-card reveal reveal-delay-1">
      <div class="feature-icon">&xotime;</div>
      <div>
        <h3>DAG workflows</h3>
        <p>Blocks form directed acyclic graphs. Branch, merge, and build
          complex multi-path pipelines visually.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="feature-card reveal reveal-delay-2">
      <div class="feature-icon">&dharl;</div>
      <div>
        <h3>Real-time preview</h3>
        <p>See results update instantly as you connect and configure blocks.
          No waiting, no re-running.</p>

<script>
  // Scroll reveal
  const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
    entries.forEach(entry => {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        entry.target.classList.add('visible');
      }
    });
  }, { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -40px 0px' });

  document.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach(el => observer.observe(el));
</script>
```
